body_content.explanation: to remove the claws (= sharp curved nails) of a cat or other animal:
examples: My cat's previous owner had her neutered and declawed.
I don't want to declaw so I wonder if anyone can tell me good alternative ways to stop a cat ripping up the furniture.

body_content.explanation: to make someone or something less dangerous or powerful:
examples: I suspect that the intention of this is to permanently declaw his critics.
The author's work has been declawed in most TV adaptations.
